original_text: Then Elijah said to all the people, “Come near to me.” And all the people came near to him. And he repaired the altar of the Lord that had been thrown down.
korean_text: 엘리야가 모든 백성을 향하여 이르되 내게로 가까이 오라 백성이 다 그에게 가까이 가매 그가 무너진 여호와의 제단을 수축하되

sentences.original_text: Then Elijah said to all the people,
And all the people came near to him.
And he repaired the altar of the Lord
